@!tr('Installing OpenTeacher in Ubuntu')!@

@!tr('This simple guide explains how to install OpenTeacher for Ubuntu. I will be using Ubuntu 10.10 (Maverick Meerkat) for this.')!@

  1. @!tr('Download the Ubuntu .deb file from the Download section of this website.')!@
  2. @!tr('When the download has completed, doubleclick the .deb file you just downloaded. This will open the Ubuntu Software Center.')!@
  3. @!tr('Click "install" to start the installation.')!@
  4. @!tr('When the installation has finished, you can start OpenTeacher from Applications -> Education -> OpenTeacher.')!@
